description: The former sports pavilion and its large outdoor are used as a community hub by Company Drinks. The multifunctional building and garden have recently been upgraded alongside a stakeholder-led physical and cultural access concept and design.

factsheet.heading: Company Drinks Pavilion and Garden
paragraphs: The former Outdoor Bowling Pavilion and Green have become Company Drinks' base in 2016. The building and garden are used and shaped by the many different user groups and visitors. The outdoor area has a community growing section, spaces for wild-life and well-being and the former green is used for wildflower growing, accessible gardening and events. The pavilion is multifunctional, with a large club room used for meetings, socials and making. The training and production kitchen provides space for shared learning and drinks making.

Like the seasons, Company Drinks changes and adapts, and is shaped by those who are involved. We collaborate and champion the ideas of those around us, encourage each other to re-imagine new ways of working, trading and existing together, through conversation, care and good company.
The design, furniture and equipment follow this idea closely.

images.title: Company Drinks Club Room with design by Sahra Hersi

location.address: Company Drinks Pavilion, Outdoor Bowls Pavilion

name: Company Drinks/Barking Park Outdoor Bowls Pavilion
